title: Lymphatic drainage
description: Lymphatic system helps our body fight diseases: bacteria, viruses and toxins are eliminated from it through the lymph. Stagnation of the lymph leads to various unpleasant consequences: from a general decrease in immunity to varicose veins and cellulitis. Lymphatic drainage massage normalises the circulation of lymph and thereby tones the walls of blood vessels, activates blood circulation and metabolism, accelerates the detoxication the body. This massage reduces cellulitis, accelerates weight loss and is recognized as an excellent prevention of varicose veins. The condition of the skin noticeably improves, as it becomes more elastic and toned.
